solution_line_template: The camel is {hare_height_inches} x {taller_factor} = <<{hare_height_inches}*{taller_factor}={camel_height_inches}>>{camel_height_inches} tall in inches.
So, the camel is {camel_height_inches} / {inches_per_foot} = <<{camel_height_inches}/{inches_per_foot}={camel_height_feet}>>{camel_height_feet} feet tall.
